data.lyric:
[ti:Here Comes Santa Claus]
[ar:Gene Autry]
[al:20 Christmas Songs, Vol. 2]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Here Comes Santa Claus (Right Down Santa Claus Lane) - Gene Autry
[00:05.38]Here comes santa claus
[00:06.42]Here comes santa claus
[00:07.68]Right down
[00:08.10]Santa claus lane
[00:09.20]
[00:10.10]Vixen blitzen
[00:10.74]And all his reindeer
[00:12.28]Pulling on the reins
[00:13.98]
[00:14.75]Bells are ringing
[00:15.89]Children singing
[00:17.15]All is merry and bright
[00:19.10]So hang your stockings
[00:20.56]And say your prayers
[00:21.64]Cause santa claus
[00:22.66]Comes tonight
[00:23.65]
[00:24.55]Here comes santa claus
[00:25.55]Here comes santa claus
[00:26.79]Right down
[00:27.30]Santa claus lane
[00:28.51]
[00:29.21]He's got a bag
[00:30.08]That's filled with toys
[00:31.18]For boys and girls again
[00:33.09]
[00:34.11]Hear those sleigh bells
[00:35.29]Jingle jangle
[00:36.33]What a beautiful sight
[00:38.02]
[00:38.72]Jump in bed
[00:40.01]Cover up your head
[00:40.84]Cause santa claus
[00:41.83]Comes tonight
[00:43.01]
[01:03.09]Here comes santa claus
[01:04.16]Here comes santa claus
[01:05.42]Right down
[01:05.98]Santa claus lane
[01:06.91]
[01:08.04]He'll come around
[01:08.74]When the church rings out
[01:09.97]It's christmas morn again
[01:12.05]
[01:12.85]Peace on earth
[01:13.66]Will come to all
[01:14.98]If we
[01:15.42]Just follow the light
[01:16.70]
[01:17.31]So let's give thanks
[01:18.47]To the lord above
[01:19.52]Cause santa claus
[01:20.52]Coming is tonight
[01:21.67]
[01:22.62]Here comes santa claus
[01:23.60]Here comes santa claus
[01:24.85]Right down
[01:25.48]Santa claus lane
[01:26.68]
[01:27.49]Vixen blitzen
[01:28.49]And all his reindeer
[01:29.70]Pulling on the reins
[01:31.59]
[01:32.30]Bells are ringing
[01:33.32]Children singing
[01:34.53]All is merry and bright
[01:36.34]
[01:36.85]Jump in bed
[01:38.29]Cover up your head
[01:39.08]Cause santa claus
[01:40.09]Comes tonight
[01:41.25]
[01:51.79]Peace on earth will come to all
[01:53.68]If we just follow the light
[01:55.65]
[01:56.27]So let's give thanks to the lord above
[01:58.61]That santa claus comes tonight
[02:00.47]
[02:01.10]So let's give thanks to the lord above
[02:03.62]That santa claus comes tonight
